tool.name: ExportDataWorkspacesToExcel
tool.displayname: Export Data Workspaces to Excel Spreadsheet
tool.summary: This tool can be used to save data workspace information from a Workflow Manager database out to a Microsoft Excel file. The file that is generated can later be used with the "Create Data Workspaces from Excel Spreadsheet" tool.
tool.usage:
• The default Workflow Manager database must be set before running this tool.

  • The user running this tool must have administrative access to the Workflow Manager database.

  • All data workspaces in the Workflow Manager database must have unique names. Any workspaces with duplicate names will be skipped.

param.name: out_file_excelFile
param.dialogReference: The Excel workbook file to which this information should be saved. ".xls" and ".xlsx" workbooks are supported as of this writing.
param.pythonReference: The Excel workbook file to which this information should be saved. ".xls" and ".xlsx" workbooks are supported as of this writing.

param.name: in_string_wmxDatabaseAlias
param.dialogReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.
param.pythonReference: An optional parameter specifying that this tool should run on some database other than the default Workflow Manager database. If left blank, the default Workflow Manager database will be used.

idCitation.resTitle: Export Data Workspaces to Excel Spreadsheet

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool can be used to save data workspace information from a Workflow Manager database out to a Microsoft Excel file. The file that is generated can later be used with the "Create Data Workspaces from Excel Spreadsheet" tool.
